subtitle: if you were to shut off your senses
close your eyes and ears and taste touch
and smell five senses we have why would
you be left with so initially for some
of us the thought may be terrified you
think you disappear but in truth none of
those senses are necessary for survival
or for that matter for anything that you
really need internally because you don't
need eyes to see yourself you don't need
ears to hear yourself and you don't need
taste touch and smelt experience
yourself these five senses were so
dominate our lives are all about
interacting with things outside of
ourselves as eyes we can see each other
not dismissing the value of that you can
see people you love you can see we're
walk you see where you are and with ears
we hear each other and the same with
other senses so who is really in control
of your life so we live in a world where
there is hyper stimulation of our senses
it's not television the internet and
ipod every one of our senses is
essentially being assaulted all the time
now we may say these are willing to
assault we've accepting them is
consenting adults but the bottom line is
senses are over stimulated so you can
rest assured as the Mystics would say
that the more senses are stimulated the
less you're in touch with yourself
because you're busy interacting with the
world around you so true that music I
mentioned music can touch your soul and
heart and you need ears to hear it but
if it's more stimulation of your ears
unless the music touching you then
you're really living outside of yourself
